glossdef.para: An application is a computer program with a graphical user interface that can be used to perform one or more activities.
An activity is a set of actions that relate to the same topic.
An action is a command that can be invoked by the user.
An application that supports document-based activities.
An activity with actions that relate to a persistent document of some kind (such as a text document or a drawing document).
A drawing is a set of figures presented on a canvas.
A figure is a visual representation of some kind (such as a line, rectangle or something more complex).
